en.slide1_1: Everything you can see and touch is made up of matter. Matter exists in three main forms: solids, liquids, and gases.
en.slide1_2: There's also the plasma state and has certain properties that other states does not have.
en.slide1_3: Every state of matter has different properties.
en.slide1_4: Let's see if we can use some of the matter properties to create some potions.
